column1: After entering Beleriand at [[Morgoth]]'s bidding, Ulfang and his sons joined the service of [[Caranthir]].<ref>{{S
column2: 18}}</ref> Their purpose was to eventually betray the Elves, which they did in the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]]. First, he made sure to delay [[Maedhros]] and his army by giving false reports of enemy presence. During the battle itself, they turned against their allies, attacking them in the rear.
